titles.title: For the relief of Vivian Eney.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 9/9/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of any claim by her against the United States for the value of compensatory time her husband had accrued for duty on the Capitol Police force at the time of his death.
